item.description:
The DrumConnection DrumCircle has a 17 year history now settling in to our NEW home at The Gibbs School, Arlington, MA

If you love drumming and want to get good at it too, you will love our circle. Alan is a master of helping new students get up to speed FAST! You will also get some hints on traditional technique, tuning help and breaks and echauffements! (we'll show that to you:) The dancers need echauffements! And solos too, when you are ready.

Refreshments will be served. Please bring your djembe if you have one. Or use one of ours!

7PM - 9PM (doors open at 6:45PM)

Directions:

The DrumConnection DrumRoom
50 Tufts Street (The Gibbs School)
Arlington, MA 02474

Lost or stolen? Call 617-686-6080

Take Mass Ave to East Arlington. Take Tufts Street at the Getty Gas Station. Go about two blocks and park on the left or right on the street. 50 Tufts is the END of the Gibbs School on your LEFT!
item.how_to_find_us: Just come on in and bring your drum or we'll help you find a perfect djembe, conga or dunun drum to play for the night.
item.why: You'll love it because you will help create the warm, supportive atmosphere. Alan will share traditional rhythms mixed in to the freeform ones. You may experience Guinea (Alan's second home) right in the circle!
item.name: Djembe and Doundoun Drum Circle New Year Pot-Luck
